product.name: Roomratv Ceiling Light Flush Mount with Night Light, 36W Light Fixture with Remote Control, Full CCT and Brightness Adjustable, 18Inch Led Ceiling Light for Kitchen, Office, Kids Room
product.description:
To make baby have a smeet sleeping
Installed in the hallway,
The night light mode is used for dailylife and the down light for working hours.
The front and back lights will light up together, illuminating the room as well as the ceiling, and the entire room will be illuminated
Walk into every family and bring you a high-quality and comfortable lighting environment.
ROOMRATV is committed to creating a comfortable and healthy living space for you. We pay attention to people's living environment and life experience, and bring you a better life through high-quality lamps.
3000K Night light
12inch white ceiling light
Remote control light fixture
2000K Night light
18inch black large ceiling light
Remote control light fixture
2000K Night light
18inch white large ceiling light
Remote control light fixture
product.bullet_points:
• NIGHT LIGHT FEATURE- This 36W light fixture in night light mode provides output 4W at 2000K for soft light at night for your kids room, office, lounge. 30-minute dim-off setting allow your child to sleep quietly before all darkness.
• COLOR & BRIGHTNESS FULLY ADJUSTABLE BY REMOTE- You can smooth adjust all brightness and all CCT from warm to cool with our remote. Collected feedback from everyone, we have upgraded the remote control solutions. The remote control needs the most common AAA batteries in the home. (Since batteries are hazardous, the package does not include them for safety)
• EASY SWITCH OF MAIN AND NIGHT LIGHT - With a single click, you can easily switch between main and night light, they can also turn on at the same time, which is simply not too convenient. The wall switch can also achieve easy switching between difficult CCT. All settings are automatically saved after 7s and the memory function is maintained.
• TRUE ONE-PERSON INSTALLATION- We have upgraded the mount plate, we fixed a lanyard on the light, you can hang the rope to the installed mount plate when connecting the wire without the need for someone to hold the light. (Look at our installation pictures, you will understand how easy it is to install a light)
• [SERVICE] : Roomratv Lighting vision is to go into every home and help all family solve lighting problems and provide comfortable lighting environment. You can contact us at any time. We are responsible for your shopping experience to the end.
features: NIGHT LIGHT FEATURE- This 36W light fixture in night light mode provides output 4W at 2000K for soft light at night for your kids room, office, lounge. 30-minute dim-off setting allow your child to sleep quietly before all darkness.

COLOR & BRIGHTNESS FULLY ADJUSTABLE BY REMOTE- You can smooth adjust all brightness and all CCT from warm to cool with our remote. Collected feedback from everyone, we have upgraded the remote control solutions. The remote control needs the most common AAA batteries in the home. (Since batteries are hazardous, the package does not include them for safety)

EASY SWITCH OF MAIN AND NIGHT LIGHT - With a single click, you can easily switch between main and night light, they can also turn on at the same time, which is simply not too convenient. The wall switch can also achieve easy switching between difficult CCT. All settings are automatically saved after 7s and the memory function is maintained.

TRUE ONE-PERSON INSTALLATION- We have upgraded the mount plate, we fixed a lanyard on the light, you can hang the rope to the installed mount plate when connecting the wire without the need for someone to hold the light.
